name: The Best Game Ever (Jateen)
description:
Welcome to The Best Game Ever!

 Join our brave little character, Mark as he goes on a journey looking to avoid the obstacles and grab as many cherries as he can and reach his destination. 

Instructions:

  • Use left/right arrow keys to move and spacebar to jump. 
  • Grab all the cherries you can while avoiding the obstacles. 
  • Reach the finish line to get to the next level.  
  • Traverse all 3 levels successfully  to beat the game. 

Good luck and see you at the end!!

Pause/Play functionality is not added yet (It's coming very soon) so only way to close the game is to either Finish it and click on Quit (only on the PC version) or force close it.
